mapper.sql: id, menuCode, parentCode, menuName, menuUrl, menuIcon, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO k12system_menu ( menuCode, parentCode, menuName, menuUrl, menuIcon, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{menuCode}, #{parentCode}, #{menuName}, #{menuUrl}, #{menuIcon}, #{status}, #{seqSort}, #{description}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{lastModifier} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE k12system_menu
menuCode = #{menuCode},
parentCode = #{parentCode},
menuName = #{menuName},
menuUrl = #{menuUrl},
menuIcon = #{menuIcon},
status = #{status},
seqSort = #{seqSort},
description = #{description},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE k12system_menu
menuCode = #{map.menuCode},
parentCode = #{map.parentCode},
menuName = #{map.menuName},
menuUrl = #{map.menuUrl},
menuIcon = #{map.menuIcon},
status = #{map.status},
seqSort = #{map.seqSort},
description = #{map.description},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k12system_menu ( menuCode, parentCode, menuName, menuUrl, menuIcon, status, seqSort, description, creator, createDate, lastModDate, lastModifier ) VALUES ( #{map.menuCode}, #{map.parentCode}, #{map.menuName}, #{map.menuUrl}, #{map.menuIcon}, #{map.status}, #{map.seqSort}, #{map.description}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.lastModifier} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM k12system_menu
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND menuCode like CONCAT('%', #{menuCode} , '%')
AND parentCode like CONCAT('%', #{parentCode} , '%')
AND menuName like CONCAT('%', #{menuName} , '%')
AND menuUrl like CONCAT('%', #{menuUrl} , '%')
AND menuIcon like CONCAT('%', #{menuIcon} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND seqSort like CONCAT('%', #{seqSort} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
